channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8300172] java/net/httpclient/MappingResponseSubscriber.java failed with java.net.ConnectException
item.description:
The following test failed in the JDK21 CI:

java/net/httpclient/MappingResponseSubscriber.java

Here's a snippet from the log file:

test MappingResponseSubscriber.testAsBytes("https://localhost:54008/https1/chunk", true): success
test MappingResponseSubscriber.testAsBytes("http://localhost:54009/http2/fixed", true): failure
java.net.ConnectException
at java.net.http/jdk.internal.net.http.HttpClientImpl.send(HttpClientImpl.java:896)
at java.net.http/jdk.internal.net.http.HttpClientFacade.send(HttpClientFacade.java:133)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
